description: Known as Fresh 48, these shoots take place at the hospital within 48 hours of a baby's birth. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Fresh and unfiltered: Capturing baby’s first hours through professional photos gains popularity
title_page: Fresh and unfiltered: Capturing baby’s first hours through professional photos gains popularity | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – Scaly skin – check. Pointy head – check. Scrawny limbs – check.
These are the least glamorous and less-than-perfect scenes that come with the arrival of a new baby. But a growing number of parents are asking and paying for such shots.
